info.title: OpenDota API
info.description:
# Introduction
The OpenDota API provides Dota 2 related data including advanced match data extracted from match replays.

You can find data that can be used to convert hero and ability IDs and other information provided by the API from the [dotaconstants](https://github.com/odota/dotaconstants) repository.

**Beginning 2018-04-22, the OpenDota API is limited to 50,000 free calls per month and 60 requests/minute** We offer a Premium Tier with unlimited API calls and higher rate limits. Check out the [API page](https://www.opendota.com/api-keys) to learn more.

api_key.name: api_key
api_key.description:
Use an API key to remove monthly call limits and to receive higher rate limits. [Learn more and get your API key](https://www.opendota.com/api-keys).
        Usage example: https://api.opendota.com/api/matches/271145478?api_key=YOUR-API-KEY
        
        API key can also be sent using the authorization header "Authorization: Bearer YOUR-API-KEY"

match_id.description: The ID number of the match assigned by Valve

barracks_status_dire.description: Bitmask. An integer that represents a binary of which barracks are still standing. 63 would mean all barracks still stand at the end of the game.

barracks_status_radiant.description: Bitmask. An integer that represents a binary of which barracks are still standing. 63 would mean all barracks still stand at the end of the game.

chat.description: Array containing information on the chat of the game

time.description: Time in seconds at which the message was said

unit.description: Name of the player who sent the message

player_slot.description: Which slot the player is in. 0-127 are Radiant, 128-255 are Dire

dire_score.description: Final score for Dire (number of kills on Radiant)

hero_id.description: The ID value of the hero played

player_slot.description: Which slot the player is in. 0-127 are Radiant, 128-255 are Dire

duration.description: Duration of the game in seconds

first_blood_time.description: Time in seconds at which first blood occurred

game_mode.description: Integer corresponding to game mode played. List of constants can be found here: https://github.com/odota/dotaconstants/blob/master/json/game_mode.json

human_players.description: Number of human players in the game

lobby_type.description: Integer corresponding to lobby type of match. List of constants can be found here: https://github.com/odota/dotaconstants/blob/master/json/lobby_type.json

negative_votes.description: Number of negative votes the replay received in the in-game client

picks_bans.description: Array containing information on the draft. Each item contains a boolean relating to whether the choice is a pick or a ban, the hero ID, the team the picked or banned it, and the order.

is_pick.description: Boolean indicating whether the choice is a pick or a ban

team.description: The team that picked or banned the hero

order.description: The order of the pick or ban

positive_votes.description: Number of positive votes the replay received in the in-game client

radiant_gold_adv.description: Array of the Radiant gold advantage at each minute in the game. A negative number means that Radiant is behind, and thus it is their gold disadvantage.

radiant_score.description: Final score for Radiant (number of kills on Radiant)

radiant_win.description: Boolean indicating whether Radiant won the match

radiant_xp_adv.description: Array of the Radiant experience advantage at each minute in the game. A negative number means that Radiant is behind, and thus it is their experience disadvantage.

start_time.description: The Unix timestamp at which the game started

tower_status_dire.description: Bitmask. An integer that represents a binary of which Dire towers are still standing.

tower_status_radiant.description: Bitmask. An integer that represents a binary of which Radiant towers are still standing.

version.description: Parse version, used internally by OpenDota

skill.description: Skill bracket assigned by Valve (Normal, High, Very High)

players.description: Array of information on individual players

player_slot.description: Which slot the player is in. 0-127 are Radiant, 128-255 are Dire

ability_upgrades_arr.description: An array describing how abilities were upgraded

ability_uses.description: Object containing information on how many times the played used their abilities

ability_targets.description: Object containing information on who the player used their abilities on

damage_targets.description: Object containing information on how and how much damage the player dealt to other heroes

actions.description: Object containing information on how many and what type of actions the player issued to their hero

additional_units.description: Object containing information on additional units the player had under their control

assists.description: Number of assists the player had

time.description: Time in seconds the buyback occurred

player_slot.description: Which slot the player is in. 0-127 are Radiant, 128-255 are Dire

connection_log.description: Array containing information about the player's disconnections and reconnections

time.description: Game time in seconds the event ocurred

player_slot.description: Which slot the player is in. 0-127 are Radiant, 128-255 are Dire

damage.description: Object containing information about damage dealt by the player to different units

damage_inflictor.description: Object containing information about about the sources of this player's damage to heroes

damage_inflictor_received.description: Object containing information about the sources of damage received by this player from heroes

damage_taken.description: Object containing information about from whom the player took damage

dn_t.description: Array containing number of denies at different times of the match

gold.description: Gold at the end of the game

gold_per_min.description: Gold Per Minute obtained by this player

gold_reasons.description: Object containing information on how the player gainined gold over the course of the match

gold_spent.description: How much gold the player spent

gold_t.description: Array containing total gold at different times of the match

hero_hits.description: Object containing information on how many ticks of damages the hero inflicted with different spells and damage inflictors

hero_id.description: The ID value of the hero played

item_0.description: Item in the player's first slot

item_1.description: Item in the player's second slot

item_2.description: Item in the player's third slot

item_3.description: Item in the player's fourth slot

item_4.description: Item in the player's fifth slot

item_5.description: Item in the player's sixth slot

item_uses.description: Object containing information about how many times a player used items

kill_streaks.description: Object containing information about the player's killstreaks

killed.description: Object containing information about what units the player killed

killed_by.description: Object containing information about who killed the player

kills_log.description: Array containing information on which hero the player killed at what time

time.description: Time in seconds the player killed the hero

lane_pos.description: Object containing information on lane position

leaver_status.description: Integer describing whether or not the player left the game. 0: didn't leave. 1: left safely. 2+: Abandoned

level.description: Level at the end of the game

lh_t.description: Array describing last hits at each minute in the game

max_hero_hit.description: Object with information on the highest damage instance the player inflicted

multi_kills.description: Object with information on the number of the number of multikills the player had

obs.description: Object with information on where the player placed observer wards. The location takes the form (outer number, inner number) and are from ~64-192.

obs_log.description: Object containing information on when and where the player placed observer wards

obs_placed.description: Total number of observer wards placed

permanent_buffs.description: Array describing permanent buffs the player had at the end of the game. List of constants can be found here: https://github.com/odota/dotaconstants/blob/master/json/permanent_buffs.json

purchase.description: Object containing information on the items the player purchased

purchase_log.description: Object containing information on when items were purchased

time.description: Time in seconds the item was bought

runes.description: Object with information about which runes the player picked up

runes_log.description: Array with information on when runes were picked up

time.description: Time in seconds rune picked up

sen.description: Object with information on where sentries were placed. The location takes the form (outer number, inner number) and are from ~64-192.

sen_left_log.description: Array containing information on when and where the player placed sentries

sen_log.description: Array with information on when and where sentries were placed by the player

sen_placed.description: How many sentries were placed by the player

stuns.description: Total stun duration of all stuns by the player

times.description: Time in seconds corresponding to the time of entries of other arrays in the match.

tower_damage.description: Total tower damage done by the player

xp_per_min.description: Experience Per Minute obtained by the player

xp_reasons.description: Object containing information on the sources of this player's experience

xp_t.description: Experience at each minute of the game

radiant_win.description: Boolean indicating whether Radiant won the match

start_time.description: Start time of the match in seconds since 1970

duration.description: Duration of the game in seconds

lobby_type.description: Integer corresponding to lobby type of match. List of constants can be found here: https://github.com/odota/dotaconstants/blob/master/json/lobby_type.json

game_mode.description: Integer corresponding to game mode played. List of constants can be found here: https://github.com/odota/dotaconstants/blob/master/json/game_mode.json

patch.description: Integer representing the patch the game was played on

region.description: Integer corresponding to the region the game was played on

isRadiant.description: Boolean for whether or not the player is on Radiant

win.description: Binary integer representing whether or not the player won

lose.description: Binary integer representing whether or not the player lost

total_gold.description: Total gold at the end of the game

total_xp.description: Total experience at the end of the game

neutral_kills.description: Total number of neutral creeps killed

tower_kills.description: Total number of tower kills the player had

courier_kills.description: Total number of courier kills the player had

lane_kills.description: Total number of lane creeps killed by the player

hero_kills.description: Total number of heroes killed by the player

observer_kills.description: Total number of observer wards killed by the player

sentry_kills.description: Total number of sentry wards killed by the player

roshan_kills.description: Total number of roshan kills (last hit on roshan) the player had

necronomicon_kills.description: Total number of Necronomicon creeps killed by the player

ancient_kills.description: Total number of Ancient creeps killed by the player

buyback_count.description: Total number of buyback the player used

lane.description: Integer referring to which lane the hero laned in

is_roaming.description: Boolean referring to whether or not the player roamed

purchase_time.description: Object with information on when the player last purchased an item

first_purchase_time.description: Object with information on when the player first puchased an item

item_win.description: Object with information on whether or not the item won

item_usage.description: Object containing binary integers the tell whether the item was purchased by the player (note: this is always 1)

purchase_tpscroll.description: Total number of TP scrolls purchased by the player

rank_tier.description: The rank tier of the player. Tens place indicates rank, ones place indicates stars.

benchmarks.description: Object containing information on certain benchmarks like GPM, XPM, KDA, tower damage, etc

patch.description: Information on the patch version the game is played on

region.description: Integer corresponding to the region the game was played on

all_word_counts.description: Word counts of the all chat messages in the player's games

my_word_counts.description: Word counts of the player's all chat messages

throw.description: Maximum gold advantage of the player's team if they lost the match

comeback.description: Maximum gold disadvantage of the player's team if they won the match

loss.description: Maximum gold disadvantage of the player's team if they lost the match

win.description: Maximum gold advantage of the player's team if they won the match

rank_tier.description: Integer indicating the rank/medal of the player

fh_unavailable.description: Indicates if we were unable to fetch full history for this player due to privacy settings

plus.description: Boolean indicating status of current Dota Plus subscription

is_contributor.description: Boolean indicating if the user contributed to the development of OpenDota

is_subscriber.description: Boolean indicating if the user subscribed to OpenDota

player_slot.description: Which slot the player is in. 0-127 are Radiant, 128-255 are Dire

radiant_win.description: Boolean indicating whether Radiant won the match

duration.description: Duration of the game in seconds

game_mode.description: Integer corresponding to game mode played. List of constants can be found here: https://github.com/odota/dotaconstants/blob/master/json/game_mode.json

lobby_type.description: Integer corresponding to lobby type of match. List of constants can be found here: https://github.com/odota/dotaconstants/blob/master/json/lobby_type.json

hero_id.description: The ID value of the hero played

start_time.description: Start time of the match in seconds elapsed since 1970

kills.description: Total kills the player had at the end of the match

deaths.description: Total deaths the player had at the end of the match

assists.description: Total assists the player had at the end of the match

skill.description: Skill bracket assigned by Valve (Normal, High, Very High). If the skill is unknown, will return null.

average_rank.description: Average rank of players with public match data

xp_per_min.description: Experience Per Minute obtained by the player

gold_per_min.description: Average gold per minute of the player

hero_damage.description: Total hero damage to enemy heroes

last_hits.description: Total last hits the player had at the end of the match

lane.description: Integer corresponding to which lane the player laned in for the match

is_roaming.description: Boolean describing whether or not the player roamed

leaver_status.description: Integer describing whether or not the player left the game. 0: didn't leave. 1: left safely. 2+: Abandoned

party_size.description: Size of the players party. If not in a party, will return 1.

hero_id.description: The ID value of the hero played

start_time.description: Time the game started in seconds since 1970

kills.description: Total kills the player had at the end of the game

deaths.description: Total deaths the player had at the end of the game

assists.description: Total assists the player had at the end of the game

skill.description: Skill bracket assigned by Valve (Normal, High, Very High)

average_rank.description: Average rank of players with public match data

leaver_status.description: Integer describing whether or not the player left the game. 0: didn't leave. 1: left safely. 2+: Abandoned

hero_id.description: The ID value of the hero played

leaver_status.description: Integer describing whether or not the player left the game. 0: didn't leave. 1: left safely. 2+: Abandoned

lobby_type.description: Integer corresponding to lobby type of match. List of constants can be found here: https://github.com/odota/dotaconstants/blob/master/json/lobby_type.json

region.description: Integer corresponding to the region the game was played on

hero_id.description: The ID value of the hero played

rating.description: The Elo rating of the team

wins.description: The number of games won by this team

losses.description: The number of losses by this team

last_match_time.description: The Unix timestamp of the last match played by this team

match_id.description: Used to identify individual matches, e.g. 3703866531

start_time.description: Unix timestamp of when the match began

leagueid.description: Identifier for the league the match took place in

league_name.description: Name of league the match took place in

series_id.description: Identifier for the series of the match

series_type.description: Type of series the match was

radiant_score.description: Number of kills the Radiant team had when the match ended

dire_score.description: Number of kills the Dire team had when the match ended

radiant_win.description: Whether or not the Radiant won the match

radiant.description: Whether the team/player/hero was on Radiant

match_id.description: Used to identify individual matches, e.g. 3703866531

radiant.description: Whether the team/player/hero was on Radiant

radiant_win.description: Whether or not the Radiant won the match

radiant_score.description: Number of kills the Radiant team had when the match ended

dire_score.description: Number of kills the Dire team had when the match ended

start_time.description: Unix timestamp of when the match began

leagueid.description: Identifier for the league the match took place in

league_name.description: Name of league the match took place in

id.description: Numeric identifier for the hero object

primary_attr.description: Hero primary shorthand attribute name, e.g. 'agi'

items.description: A hero's role in the game

last_login.description: Date and time of last login to OpenDota

full_history_time.description: Date and time of last request to refresh player's match history

cheese.description: Amount of dollars the player has donated to OpenDota

fh_unavailable.description: Whether the refresh of player' match history failed

is_locked.description: Whether the roster lock is active

is_pro.description: Whether the player is professional or not

locked_until.description: When the roster lock will end

radiant_win.description: Boolean indicating whether Radiant won the match

duration.description: Duration of the game in seconds

last_match_time.description: last_match_time. May not be present or null.

hero_id.description: The ID value of the hero played
The ID value of the hero played
The ID value of the hero played

turbo_pick.description: Picks in Turbo mode this month

turbo_win.description: Wins in Turbo mode this month

hero_id.description: Numeric identifier for the hero object

duration_bin.description: Lower bound of number of seconds the match lasted

early_game_items.description: Items bought in the first 10 min of the game, with cost at least 700

mid_game_items.description: Items bought between 10 and 25 min of the game, with cost at least 2000

late_game_items.description: Items bought at least 25 min after game started, with cost at least 4000

is_current_team_member.description: If this player is on the current roster

hero_id.description: The ID value of the hero played

time.description: Ingame time in seconds before the item was purchased

games.description: The number of games where the hero bought this item before this time

wins.description: The number of games won where the hero bought this item before this time

games.description: The number of games where the hero played in this lane role

wins.description: The number of games won where the hero played in this lane role

is_radiant.description: Boolean indicating whether Radiant executed this scenario

region.description: Region the game was played in

games.description: The number of games where this scenario occurred

wins.description: The number of games won where this scenario occured

limitParam.name: limit
limitParam.description: Number of matches to limit to

offsetParam.name: offset
offsetParam.description: Number of matches to offset start by

withHeroIdParam.name: with_hero_id
withHeroIdParam.description: Hero IDs on the player's team (array)

againstHeroIdParam.name: against_hero_id
againstHeroIdParam.description: Hero IDs against the player's team (array)

withAccountIdParam.name: with_account_id
withAccountIdParam.description: Account IDs on the player's team (array)

againstAccountIdParam.name: against_account_id
againstAccountIdParam.description: Account IDs against the player's team (array)

excludedAccountIdParam.name: excluded_account_id
excludedAccountIdParam.description: Account IDs not in the match (array)

significantParam.name: significant
significantParam.description: Whether the match was significant for aggregation purposes. Defaults to 1 (true), set this to 0 to return data for non-standard modes/matches.

sortParam.name: sort
sortParam.description: The field to return matches sorted by in descending order

havingParam.name: having
havingParam.description: The minimum number of games played, for filtering hero stats

lessThanMatchIdParam.name: less_than_match_id
lessThanMatchIdParam.description: Get matches with a match ID lower than this value

matchOverviewParam.name: overview
matchOverviewParam.description: Only fetch data required for match overview page

get.description: Distribution of matches in a single stat
Get list of randomly sampled public matches
Get list of parsed match IDs
Submit arbitrary SQL queries to the database

parameters.name: sql
parameters.description: The PostgreSQL query as percent-encoded string.

get.description: Distributions of MMR data by bracket and country
Benchmarks of average stat values for a hero
Finds recent matches by heroes played
Get stats about hero performance in recent matches
Get recent matches with a hero
Get results against other heroes for a hero
Get hero performance over a range of match durations
Get players who have played this hero
Get item popularity of hero categoried by start, early, mid and late game, analyzed from professional games

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number, zero indexed. Each page returns up to 1000 entries.

get.description: Get players who have played for a team
Get data to construct a replay URL with
Get top performances in a stat
Get top currently ongoing live games
Win rates for certain item timings on a hero for items that cost at least 1400 gold
Win rates for heroes in certain lane roles

parameters.name: lane_role
parameters.description: Filter by lane role 1-4 (Safe, Mid, Off, Jungle)

get.description: Get static game data mirrored from the dotaconstants repository.
Gets an array of available resources.
